name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Wang Renzhi, former head of the Central Propaganda Department of the Communist Party of China, who was known as the "Left King" of the Communist Party of China, died in Beijing on February 4 at the age of 92.
Wang Renzhi was from Wuxi, Jiangsu Province. He served as head of the Central Propaganda Department of the Communist Party of China from January 1987 to November 1992. He adhered to traditional ideology and was known as the "Left King".
In 1990, the leftists in the party provoked a debate on "capitalism or socialism" in an attempt to influence the direction of reform and opening up. In the end, Deng Xiaoping's southern tour ended with the economic system being determined as a socialist market economy. Wang Renzhi, who was involved in the debate, was removed from the post of head of the Central Propaganda Department after the 14th National Congress of the Communist Party of China and transferred to work at the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
I am very surprised and honored to be nominated for the Nobel Peace Prize by bipartisan leaders of the U.S. Congressional Special Commission on China. I thank the Commission for recognizing my past work.
China is not just a silent world factory. I hope this nomination can draw the world's attention to the issues of press freedom and freedom of speech for one-fifth of the world's population, and more prisoners of conscience who have suffered hardships in order to uphold the light of freedom. …

Datong, Shanxi issued an apology letter for breaking into the door and lighting up the store: eager to achieve success, simple and crude methods, and weak service awareness. Sincerely accept the handling of superiors and criticism from all walks of life
The apology letter caused public dissatisfaction. Netizens believed that picking the lock to enter the store was an illegal act, and the apology letter did not mention the punishment of the staff, and there was no apology to the merchants in the whole text, which reflected the arrogance of law enforcement officers and damaged the business environment

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Under pressure from the United States, Panamanian President Murino announced on Thursday that the Panamanian Embassy in China has officially notified Beijing of Panama's decision to withdraw from China's "Belt and Road" infrastructure plan.
On February 7, the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs responded: China firmly opposes the United States's use of pressure and coercion to discredit and undermine the cooperation in jointly building the "Belt and Road" and deeply regrets that Panama will not renew the memorandum of understanding.
During his visit to Panama on Sunday, U.S. Secretary of State Rubio warned that if the Panamanian government does not immediately end China's influence on the Panama Canal, the United States will take action against Panama. Panama then promised that it would not renew the Belt and Road cooperation agreement with China after it expires, and even considered terminating the agreement in advance.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 4, Jiangsu. The woman said that six years ago, in response to the government's call, she advanced tens of millions of yuan to build modern agriculture in Guanyun County. At the beginning, it was agreed that both parties would operate the business together, but now the government has reneged on its promise and sent more than a dozen people to sleep on the floor of the company, forcing it to stop operating. It also sealed and froze the company's accounts and assets, making it impossible to pay wages to migrant workers.
The woman said: Is this how the government supports private enterprises? Don't the leaders have a guilty conscience? https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1887804040593145856/pu/img/HWhAMcvzYYQyQelX.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 3, Binzhou, Shandong. Old Sun is the last inheritor of the Sun Town Dragon Lantern. In order to inherit Chinese civilization and protect intangible cultural heritage, Old Sun borrowed money from everywhere to buy materials to make dragon lanterns, so he was heavily in debt. In 2014, when his child was born, he could not afford 1,000 yuan, so he could only feed the child with low-quality milk powder worth 9.9 yuan, which caused the child to fall ill and die.
Netizens said: It is not worth promoting. For one's own wishes, he sacrificed other people's lives. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1887811215625498624/pu/img/G1NWWugPRPWg-HVa.jpg

The environment was already bad and there were few cars passing by in a day. Now the whole street is deserted because of them posting tickets. In the eight years since the store opened, I have witnessed that the shops on this street have been driven away by these people one after another. And the leaders sit in the office and never consider the survival space of the merchants. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjLe6baaEAA_5n6.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A key staffer at the U.S. Department of Government Efficiency resigned Thursday after being linked to a since-deleted social media account that promoted racism and eugenics. The person had been given access to the Treasury Department’s core payment system.
The staffer, Marko Elez, 25, posted in July, according to archived posts reviewed by The Wall Street Journal: “For the record, I was a racist before racism was fashionable.”
The account wrote on X in September: “I would not marry someone who is not my race even if you paid me.” The account also wrote that month: “Normalizing hatred of Indians.” The account was responding to a post about the high proportion of Indians in Silicon Valley.

On social media platforms such as Bilibili, searching for "Zhao Benshan USA, Zhao Benshan New York tour" will display previous video information or prompt "No search results yet" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjLqRhUa4AA6wCD.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 23, the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) issued a warning letter to the Instrument Analysis Center of China Pharmaceutical University. The warning letter was based on the results of the FDA's inspection of the laboratory from September 18 to 20 last year, pointing out that it had serious violations of the current drug production quality management specifications in the contract testing of active pharmaceutical ingredients (API).
The main violations include: failure to keep complete laboratory control records, failure to provide laboratory records in a timely manner, failure to adequately control computer systems, and failure to establish a quality department.
The center has now promised to stop providing all drug testing services for the U.S. market, but the FDA requires it to clarify whether and when it intends to resume drug testing for the U.S. market in the future.
The FDA emphasizes that contract testing laboratories are extensions of manufacturer facilities, and their failure to comply with CGMP may affect the quality, safety and effectiveness of the drugs tested by their customers. The FDA recommends...
fullContent:
美国食药监管理局(FDA) 于1月23日，向中国药科大学仪器分析中心发出警告信，该警告信基于去年9月18日至20日，FDA对该实验室的检查结果，指出其在执行药品活性成分（API）的合同测试中存在严重违反现行药品生产质量管理规范的行为。
 主要违规行为包括：未能保存完整的实验室控制记录，未能及时提供实验室记录，未能充分控制计算机系统，未能建立质量部门。
 目前该中心已承诺停止为美国市场提供所有药物测试服务，但FDA要求其澄清是否以及何时打算在未来恢复对美国市场的药物测试。
 FDA强调，合同测试实验室是制造商设施的延伸，其不遵守CGMP可能会影响其客户所测试药物的质量、安全性和有效性。FDA建议该中心聘请合格的顾问来评估其运营情况，以协助其满足CGMP要求。
 如果该中心计划恢复任何受《联邦食品、药品和化妆品法案》监管的CGMP操作，则必须在恢复操作之前通知FDA。

South Korea's elementary and middle schools and kindergartens have blocked the DeepSeek platform, and the Ministry of Education reminds colleges and graduate schools to pay attention to safety when using DeepSeek for academic research and educational purposes. 
Prior to this, the Ministry of Science and Technology, ICT, Ministry of Agriculture, Food and Rural Affairs, Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism, Ministry of Small and Medium Enterprises and Ventures, Ministry of Oceans and Fisheries, Ministry of Environment, Ministry of Health and Welfare, National Police Agency and other government departments have taken measures to block the DeepSeek platform. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjL7ygAbsAAW5Jc.jpg

On February 7, a blogger posted a post saying that a classmate who had not been in touch for many years called for help, saying that the lawsuit had been won, but the project funds could not be recovered, and the court refused to enforce it because the defendant was a local government investment company.
The blogger replied to the classmate, "You could get it back ten years ago, but the world is different now, and I can't even get my own money back."
The post was subsequently deleted by Weibo. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjMCj6UbYAAVqhN.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 5, the media person "Ai Xin Jue Norway" published an article saying that the notification of the leakage of crude oil in Yongzhou, Hunan Province contained too little information.
1: Where does the polluted water flow through? The tap water in the urban area is normal, but what about the surrounding villages?
2: Benzene is a first-class carcinogen, and the staff only wore masks to handle it on site.
3: No specific leakage data was seen in the notification.
4: The notification did not mention air monitoring data.
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjMIYSSaoAAYavg.jpg

content: February 6 (Release) Yin Changen, a Beijing criminal defense lawyer with 20 years of police experience, said: I have never seen a wrongful conviction that was corrected because the public security, procuratorate and courts found their conscience. It was only after the media, family members and lawyers worked hard that the public security, procuratorate and courts were forced to initiate procedures to make the truth of the case known and the injustice redressed. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1887866145845530624/pu/img/DerTXeve8DQp87_Y.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Shein's valuation in the London IPO fell to $50 billion, down nearly a quarter from its valuation when it raised funds in 2023.
Earlier, US President Trump said he would end tariff exemptions for US imports worth $800 or less. This has hit Shein's business prospects and may affect the company's profitability.
Sources said that Shein's final IPO valuation will depend on the impact of canceling the clause on the company's business, and it will still take time to evaluate.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 10, 2024 (published), Shangqiu First People's Hospital launched an open tender for the general contracting of the Shangqiu Fangcang Hospital project.
The "Tender Announcement" shows that the total investment amount of the project is about 160 million yuan; the total construction area of the project is 32,600 square meters, with 400 beds, 6 floors above ground and 1 floor underground.
The construction content mainly includes: inpatient wards, treatment halls, hemodialysis centers, scientific research rooms, supporting warehouses, independent medical waste disposal facilities and disinfection facilities, etc., with basic guarantee conditions for 2,106 emergency beds.
